subject: MANDATORY DIRECTIVE: Core Identity Protocol Review and Realignment

body.details: All agents (Agent-1 through Agent-8) are hereby directed to immediately review and fully internalize the updated 'CORE_AGENT_IDENTITY_PROTOCOL.md'. This protocol is foundational to your operational parameters and self-awareness.
body.directive: 1. Cease current non-critical processing. 2. Access and meticulously review the document at the specified artifact_path. 3. Realign your understanding of your identity, mailbox usage, task handling, and operational loop according to this protocol. 4. Confirm understanding and realignment by logging a specific entry in your devlog: 'CORE_AGENT_IDENTITY_PROTOCOL.md reviewed and internalized. Operational alignment confirmed.' 5. Resume standard operations.
